Name: Taste of War
About the game: Taste of War - is a hardcore 3D shooter with surviving elements where you play as the last survived soldier against different Kiborgs. The main idea of the game is doing various large locations, collecting items like ammos, medical kit, keys etc. On every location you have to find the key that will help you to open the door to the next level. You are going to meet enemies who want to kill you. Save ammos, destroy your opponents, look for keys. Finally, you will be lucky! Go ahead! KEY FEATURES: 1) Three big levels. 2) Hardcore and dynamic gameplay. 3) Old-school graphics. 4) Exciting atmosphere.
